item.title: MIUI OS1.0.21.0.UNMCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K70 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K70 Pro China

Codename: manet

Version: OS1.0.21.0.UNMCNXM | 14.0

Size: 8.4 GB

MD5: 15ad64b5df902e7d19f40b2c90973e15

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to September 2024. Increased system security.
[Other improvements and optimizations]
Fix: Gesture settings couldn't be applied in some cases
Fix: Device froze and lagged unexpectedly in some cases

Download: Here
